text: Hulaŋ 20.4 HJL 19.29, 21.29, Ef 6.21 akape avi Polɨ hula hɨdavɨhadami. Nulɨdɨ ibi nameŋ. Mu Sopatelɨ Belia haiabɨla hɨsɨŋ. Nudɨ iaganu Pilusɨ. Mu hulaŋ ahica Tesalonaika haiabɨla hɨsɨŋ Alisɨtalɨkusɨ hula Sekudusɨ hula. Mu Gaiusɨ Delɨbe haiabɨla hɨsɨŋ. Mu Timoti. Mu hulaŋ ahica Esia fɨli tɨbɨ hɨsɨŋ Tikikusɨ hula Tɨlofimusɨ hula. Nɨbɨlaŋ Polɨ ani ahuata hameŋ hɨdavɨhadami.
